posts.post_title: FS:  T205 Cy Young Sweet Caporal SGC 4.5
posts.post_content:
Adjusting some of my hobby interest and figured someone here would be interested in adding this to their collection.  Looking for SOLD and I will cover shipping in US/tracking.  More pics post 3.
